Summary: 4 of us watched LARGE object hiding in cloudcover,in and out of clouds
divs: Sighting Details4th of july camping with 3 friends 1986.state land off taconic parkway.we were nightfishing and just hanging out,when my friend bill blurts out WHAT THE F*** IS THAT..so we all say what are you talkin about?he said look at the lights in the clouds.So we all start looking up,but didnt see anything at first,so,by now we are looking at bill like hes stupid or hes goofin on us,when all of a sudden,everything lit up like a christmas tree and we all seen what bill was talking about..This object was MASSIVE!!!it was at least a couple thousand feet above us,but we could all see the lights and make out the boomerang shape,it seemed to be moving in and out of the clouds,not in any general direction,just staying in the clouds.When the clouds broke open we would see it again,then it would move to another cloud and we could see the cloud light up brighter than the others..meanwhile,my friend danny taps me on the shoulder and sais you know what were seeing a UFO!!we all pretty much agreed..we all were AMAZED at the size of this thing,and how it seemed to move in and out of the clouds.THIS WAS NO AIRPLANE.it moved back and forth,up and down and as big as it was,made no sound.we ALL watched this for,what i thought was 15 or 20 mins,but my other friend Kevin M.swares it was there over an hour,to this day,we all still talk about our sighting.weeks later,Bill is at my house with a couple of newspaper clippings about UFO sightings in our area of the hudson valley N.Y.so i know we all saw what later turned out to be the BOOMERANG!!WEwent back to our campsite a few more times that summerbut didnt see anything.We did come across an older couple who saw the same object at about the same time while camping a couple miles away from our location.Considering all the witnesses,the newspaper stories,Iam convinced we all saw the Hudson Valley Boomerang that night..My father a retired minister,believed me when i told him about this.He told me he and a friend saw something they couldnt explain in up state N.Y back in the 1960s.Inever gave UFOs much thought,but after what we saw that night,I know now theyre real,and visit us regularly!!!!!
